messages.message: ah — so that environment variable didn’t help me since I was already using the docker build/run, it seemed to help bc I was unlucky immediately before (OOM hit) vs afterwards the OOM was avoided (for one run). I did more testing on that docker image and it seemed to just be random whether the first run was successful or not albeit subsequent runs did have a lower probability of succeeding than the first.

The problem turned out to be related to the Docker service on Macs, they have a memory limit for all of the containers which by default seem to be 4 GB. Presumably this cap was getting hit (I’m running a few different services with the docker containers instead of locally), bumping that to 8 GB solved the problem.
